Detailed Description

template<class Concrete>
class UObjectDumpable_Adapter< Concrete >

class UObjectDumpable_Adapter

This class inherits the interface of the abstract UObjectDumpable class and is instantiated with the implementation of the concrete component 'class Concrete'. This design is similar to the Adapter and Decorator patterns from the 'Gang of Four' book. Note that 'class Concrete' need not inherit from a common class since UObjectDumpable provides the uniform virtual interface!
